source.name: Strategic Plan – Department of Personnel and Administration Smart Submission
source.description:
DPA FY13-14
In accordance with the SMART Act (HB10-1119), the Department of Personnel & Administration has assembled the Department's strategic plan.  This strategic plan represents a considerable effort undertaken by Director Kathy Nesbitt and the DPA leadership team to prioritize and focus the Department's efforts and resources on the functions that will provide the greatest service to our customers and the citizens of Colorado.  It is important to note that the strategic plan represents a living document that, like any other, can only be improved through ongoing scrutiny and revision.  As a result, the Department is continuing to refine the information presented within the strategic plan.
